ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We gratefully acknowledge J. Wu for the XPS measurement. M.Y. acknowledges the support from IMPRS-RECHARGE. We thank the High-Performance Computing (HPC) Platform of ShanghaiTech University for computation time. Funding: This work was financially supported by the European Research Council (ERC Advanced Grant No. 291472 “Idea Heusler”) and ERC Advanced Grant (no. 742068) “TOPMAT”. M.E.K. acknowledges the Netherlands Organization for Scientific Research (NWO) (no. 022.005.006). E.L. acknowledges the National Key R&D Program of China (no. 2017YFA0206303) and the National Natural Science Foundation of China (no. 51722106). Author contributions: C.Fe. conceived the original idea and supervised the project. G.L. conceived and designed the catalytic experiments. E.L. performed the single-crystal growth and magnetic and electric resistivity measurements with the help of V.S. M.E.K. contributed the single-crystal XRD. L.J. and S.W. performed the STM measurement. R.S., A.K.S., and S.P. carried out the TEM measurement. Q.X., W.S., Y.S., and E.L. contributed the theoretical calculation. E.L,, C.Fu, N.K., M.Y., H.T., J.G., and G.A. helped on the data analysis. G.L. wrote the manuscript. All authors discussed the results and commented on the manuscript. Competing interests: The authors declare that they have no competing interests. Data and materials availability: All data needed to evaluate the conclusions in the paper are present in the paper and/or the Supplementary Materials. Additional data related to this paper may be requested from the authors.
